net.sitecore.android.sdk.ui

Interface ItemViewBinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultItemViewBinder

    public interface ItemViewBinder
    Defines how to map ScItem to list item view.

    • Method Summary

      Bind an existing view to the item.

      Makes a new view to hold the data of the item.
